Toggle Menu

View Reports

View connection status, key status, and other Minion details.

Report Description
Minions Connection State Shows the number of Salt Minions that are currently online.
Minions Key State Displays the status of all keys that have been received by all Salt Masters.
Minions OS Type Displays the OS that is installed on each managed system.
Minions Versions Displays the software version of the Salt Minion on each managed system.
